resources.string: Decimal places sets the amount of digits after the decimal point that is shown in the answer (unless they are zero, or the accuracy is not sufficient).
Digit grouping separates groups of three digits in answers by a space, e.g. 100 000.
For information about libraries used by this
app, their licenses and other legal information:
Like the app and want to support it?
suggestions, send us an email at:
If switched on, will round numbers to their last digit when not all digits can be displayed.
